name: Calculator
description: This is a javascript calculator I built with several classmates for a web applications class. I styled the calculator and the back-end was a collaboration between the group.

name: Webiste
description: My website is currently in its second iteration. From time to time I recreate to try out different tools, but the content is usually the same. I host the source on github.

name: Raspbery Pi Webserver
description: I host this website on a Raspbery Pi in my living room. Sometimes I host other things on it too.
